module-option.name: principalsQuery
module-option.value: SELECT password AS 'Password' FROM user_table WHERE email = ? AND active = 1

module-option.name: rolesQuery
module-option.value: SELECT name, 'Roles' FROM user_table_role_table JOIN role_table ON (role_table.id = user_table_role_table.roles_id) JOIN user_table ON (user_table.id = user_table_role_table.User_id) WHERE email = ?
